layout.singingstanza: The B- -- I- -- B- -- L- -- E, Yes, that's the book for me, I stand a -- lone on the Word of God, The B- -- I- -- B- -- L- -- E. The B- -- I- -- B- -- L- -- E, Yes, that's the book for me, I stand a -- lone, The B- -- I- -- B- -- L- -- E.

lyrics.stanza: The B-I-B-L-E, Yes, that's the book for me, I stand alone on the Word of God, The B-I-B-L-E. The B-I-B-L-E, Yes, that's the book for me, I stand alone, The B-I-B-L-E.
